DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Trial LY900003 Plus Gemcitabine Cisplatin Versus Gemcitabine Cisplatin Patients With Advanced , Previously Untreated Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Stage IIIB IV nonsmall lung cancer 2 . Able visit doctor 's office 3 . At least 18 year age 4 . Adequate kidney , adrenal , liver function 1 . Prior chemotherapy biologic therapy NSCLC 2 . Central nervous system tumor 3 . Pregnant breastfeeding
